snippet: A Human Rights Watch video report on xenophobic attacks in Greece includes the testimony of foreign-born migrants who complained that the police refused to properly investigate the violence.
abstract: A Human Rights Watch video report on xenophobic attacks in Greece includes the testimony of foreign-born migrants who complained that the police refused to properly investigate the violence.

headline.main: Listening to the Victims of Xenophobic Violence in Greece

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
